message: According to pingdom the response time is now lower than it has ever been, though...

I noticed response times were exceedingly slow over the weekend, is this a temporal thing related to migrations? http://dl.dropbox.com/u/569041/Screen%20shot%202011-07-11%20at%209.35.19%20AM.png Found it challenging to use a django shell too (would vary between 9600 baud modem and millisecond responsiveness)
(The old one still works but proxies everything through)
Yeh, changed the A record over the weekend, thanks.
Yeah, for a while there we were running the databases from EC2 in US-East and the rest of the site from the UK, so there was some nasty latency for the high-query sites
We finished moving the databases yesterday, however
Also, if you have a custom domain, check that you're not using an A record to our old loadbalancer - we'll be emailing around about this, but the new (faster) endpoint starts 109.
